Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.server.model.cards.initialResourceGold

Class PlayableSide

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.server.model.cards.initialResourceGold.PlayableSide
Direct Known Subclasses:
Back, PointsGiver
public class PlayableSide extends Object
Class that represents one side (Front or Back) of an INITIAL, GOLD or RESOURCE card

    • isPlayable

      public boolean isPlayable(PlayerArea playerArea, int x, int y)
      This method verifies that the card is playable at the specified coordinates
      Parameters:
      playerArea - : of the Player that wish to play the card
      Returns:
      True: if the indicated position is free of other cards and the requirements of the card I want to play are fulfilled False: otherwise

    • play

      public void play(PlayerArea playerArea, int x, int y)
      This method plays the card, placing it on the specified coordinates
      Parameters:
      playerArea - : the PlayerArea of the Player that is playing the card
      x - : the x coordinate where to play the card
      y - : the y coordinate where to play the card

    • coverCorners

      protected void coverCorners(PlayerArea playerArea, int x, int y)
      This method covers the corners of the corner-adjacent cards to the played card, if they are present.
      Parameters:
      playerArea - : the PlayerArea of the Player that has played the card
      x - : the x coordinate where the card has been played
      y - : the y coordinate where the card has been played

    • gainSymbols

      protected void gainSymbols(PlayerArea playerArea)
      This method updates the Symbol's counters of the Player with the Symbols on the played card
      Parameters:
      playerArea - : the playerArea where to add symbols

    • handCardToString

      public String handCardToString(Symbol kingdom)
      To draw the cards in TUI (with the view used to draw the cards in player's hand)
      Parameters:
      kingdom - : the central symbol of the card (used to know the color to use to draw the card)
